title: Schedule a Recruiter Phone Screen
description: A recruiter wants to schedule a 30-minute phone screen with a promising candidate.

tasks.description: Identify the candidate to be screened.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter selects the candidate in the ATS.

tasks.description: Use a scheduling tool (e.g., Calendly) to send the candidate a link to the recruiter's availability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter sends an email with the scheduling link.

tasks.description: Once the candidate selects a time, confirm the appointment is automatically added to both calendars.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter verifies the meeting appears on their calendar.
